title: Mandarin Square, One of a Pair
description: Pair of k\'ossu mandarin squares with central design of peacock. Clouds, peonies, sun disk, Buddhist emblems and Eternal Sea in shades of blue, green, red, pink, yellow and orange. Border of swastika fret meander in gold on black. Painted details. Note use of peacock feathers in weaving.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
